oai_dc:dc.dc:title: C. Lamar Wallis receiving award
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Public Library & Information Center; American Library Association; libraries; awards; Wallis, C. Lamar;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: C. Lamar Wallis receiving the John Cotton Davis Award at the ALA convention in Miami, FL, in 1962. It was presented by Anne L. Webb and Howard Haycraft, president of H. W. Wilson Company.
